SearchWaitingLotList.MainSQL: SELECT DURB.DURABLE_ID , DURB.DURABLE_STATUS_CODE AS 유형 , TMR.EQPTID AS 설비 , TMR.RACK_ID AS 위치 , TMR.RACK_STAT_CODE AS 상태 , 'RACK IN' AS 자재유형 , TSFD.DEMAND_TYPE , LOT.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE AS LT -- , WA.LOTID 삭제 , LOT.WORK_ORDER_ID , LOT.PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION_ID , LOT.PROCESS_CODE FROM TB_EGN_LOT_INFO LOT INNER JOIN TB_MHS_RACK TMR ON LOT.DURABLE_ID = TMR.MCS_CST_ID INNER JOIN TB_EGN_DURB_INFO DURB ON DURB.DURABLE_ID = TMR.MCS_CST_ID -- INNER JOIN LOT L -- ON L.LOTID = LOT.LOTID -- INNER JOIN WIP W -- ON W.LOTID = LOT.LOTID INNER JOIN TB_SFC_FP_DETL_PLAN TSFD ON TSFD.WOID = LOT.WORK_ORDER_ID UNION ALL SELECT DURB.DURABLE_ID , DURB.DURABLE_STATUS_CODE AS 유형 , THTR.EQPTID AS 설비 , THTR.PORT_ID AS 위치 , THTR.REQ_STAT_CODE AS 상태 , 'REQ IN' AS 자재유형 , TSFD.DEMAND_TYPE , LOT.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE AS LT -- , WA.LOTID 삭제 , LOT.WORK_ORDER_ID , LOT.PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION_ID , LOT.PROCESS_CODE FROM TB_EGN_LOT_INFO LOT INNER JOIN TB_MHS_TRF_REQ THTR ON LOT.DURABLE_ID = THTR.CSTID INNER JOIN TB_EGN_DURB_INFO DURB ON DURB.DURABLE_ID = THTR.CSTID -- INNER JOIN LOT L -- ON L.LOTID = LOT.LOTID -- INNER JOIN WIP W -- ON W.LOTID = LOT.LOTID INNER JOIN TB_SFC_FP_DETL_PLAN TSFD ON TSFD.WOID = LOT.WORK_ORDER_ID
